reviews.reason_text: Imposes necessary steps for identity verification.

reviews.text: The system shall require users to submit a selfie video with a maximum duration of 5 seconds.
reviews.reason_text: Enforces a maximum video duration for submissions.

reviews.text: These videos must meet defined quality standards suitable for accurate biometric analysis and identity verification.
reviews.reason_text: Mandates quality standards for biometric data.

reviews.text: Clear visibility of the user's face is mandatory to ensure effective processing of biometric data.

**Liveness**  
All submitted selfie videos must undergo biometric liveness detection compliant with ISO/IEC 30107-3 standards.
To successfully verify authenticity and prevent spoofing attempts, the detection system must achieve a spoof detection score of 0.2 or lower.
reviews.reason_text: Sets a score threshold to prevent spoofing.

reviews.text: Submissions failing this threshold shall be rejected automatically, prompting users to submit a new video.
reviews.reason_text: Rejection of low matches triggers re-submission.

reviews.text: The identity verification process shall incorporate mandatory Anti-Money Laundering (AML) checks, specifically cross-referencing user identities against the OFAC and EU sanctions lists.
reviews.reason_text: Enforces AML checks against sanctions lists.

reviews.text: Any positive matches during this screening will trigger immediate verification failure and initiate manual escalation to the compliance department for further review and resolution.
reviews.reason_text: Triggers verification failure on positive matches.

reviews.text: All biometric templates generated from user submissions must be securely stored utilizing AES-256-GCM encryption.
reviews.reason_text: Enforces secure storage using AES encryption.

reviews.text: To maintain compliance with GDPR Article 5(1)(e) regarding data retention limits, stored biometric templates shall be purged from the system after a retention period of five years.
Early deletion must also be supported upon explicit user request.
reviews.reason_text: Supports early deletion on user request.
